name: RedShift (itch) (ConstructGames)
description:
Meet RedShift, the flight puzzle game where to earn the highest score you need to set off the Pulse changing reality around you.
Collect the golden orbs for a boost, if you find the rare red shift diamond you will trigger a pulse that will race along your path earning you a massive score.
This game has been optimised for the Xbox Gamepad for the best experience.
Game does support Logitech RGB keyboards which pass level lighting to your accessories.

Check out my channel for my other projects over at: 
http://www.youtube.com/c/ConstructGames
